document_data.name: ''Volatile Potion of Transformation''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Volatile potions of transformation''''' were magic [[potion]] that received a recreational use in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Volatile potions of transformation'' possessed magics that altered the imbiber's appearance for a short period of time, seemingly at random. Among the forms the potion resulted in were various animal forms, such as [[wolves]], [[pig]]s, or [[chicken]]s.
document_data.History: These volatile potions were consumed recreationally during the annual celebration of the [[Masquerade of Liars]] in the city of [[Neverwinter]] as early as of the mid-to-late 15{{th}} century DR.
